Player History

Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Brooklyn on 6/5/2016 (Going to BRO: LF Thomas Shaw, P Grady Horvath. Going to SLB: SS Bill Coakley)...
